# Intro

This repo will house the content/homework assigments and projects for the course Intro to Machine Learning with TensorFlow.js hosted [here](https://academy.infinite.red/p/beginning-machine-learning-with-tensorflow-js)

## Setup

Clone the repo with:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/jonniebigodes/academy_infinity_red_intro_machine_learning.git
```

Navigate to the folder and install dependencies with your favorite package manager.


## Run the code

You can either run it in development mode with:

```bash
yarn develop
```
Or with npm with:
```bash
npm run develop
```
